headline.main: F1 Tire Tender Now in Ecclestone's Court
headline.print_headline: F1 Tire Tender Now in Ecclestone's Court

docs.snippet: Bernie Ecclestone will decide whether Michelin or current suppliers Pirelli secure Formula One's three-year tire contract from 2017 after both companies passed a technical and safety hurdle....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bernie Ecclestone will decide whether Michelin or current suppliers Pirelli secure Formula One's three-year tire contract from 2017 after both companies passed a technical and safety hurdle.

headline.main: Caesars Faces Bankruptcy After Losing Key Ruling
headline.print_headline: Caesars Faces Bankruptcy After Losing Key Ruling

docs.snippet: Caesars Entertainment Corp may be closer to joining its operating unit in bankruptcy after a federal judge refused to protect the casino company from creditor lawsuits seeking up to $11 billion, sending its stock plummeting....
docs.lead_paragraph: Caesars Entertainment Corp may be closer to joining its operating unit in bankruptcy after a federal judge refused to protect the casino company from creditor lawsuits seeking up to $11 billion, sending its stock plummeting.

docs.snippet: Grain futures were mixed Thursday on the Chicago Board of Trade....

headline.main: Obama Praises Afghan Efforts to Reconcile With Taliban
headline.print_headline: Obama Praises Afghan Efforts to Reconcile With Taliban

headline.main: Hilton Closes Longtime Hotel Casino in Puerto Rico
headline.print_headline: Hilton Closes Longtime Hotel Casino in Puerto Rico

docs.snippet: One of Puerto Rico's biggest and best known casinos closed Wednesday after 40 years of operation in another blow to the U.S. territory's struggling economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: One of Puerto Rico's biggest and best known casinos closed Wednesday after 40 years of operation in another blow to the U.S. territory's struggling economy.

headline.main: NY Board Backs $15 Minimum Wage Hike for Fast-Food Workers
headline.print_headline: NY Board Backs $15 Minimum Wage Hike for Fast-Food Workers

docs.snippet: Fast-food workers in New York state would see a super-sized raise under a plan to phase in a $15 minimum wage — the first time a state has singled out a particular industry for such an increase....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fast-food workers in New York state would see a super-sized raise under a plan to phase in a $15 minimum wage — the first time a state has singled out a particular industry for such an increase.

headline.main: Prince Ali Tells Blatter to Stay Away From FIFA Reform Process
headline.print_headline: Prince Ali Tells Blatter to Stay Away From FIFA Reform Process

docs.snippet: Prince Ali bin Al Hussein of Jordan, who failed in an attempt to replace Sepp Blatter as FIFA president in May, says Blatter should not be handling the reform process at world football's scandal-hit governing body and that the task should be left ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Prince Ali bin Al Hussein of Jordan, who failed in an attempt to replace Sepp Blatter as FIFA president in May, says Blatter should not be handling the reform process at world football's scandal-hit governing body and that the task should be left to his successor.

headline.main: Alleged Charleston Shooter Faces Federal Hate Crime Charges-Lynch
headline.print_headline: Alleged Charleston Shooter Faces Federal Hate Crime Charges-Lynch

docs.snippet: Alleged Charleston church shooter Dylann Roof faces federal hate crimes and firearms charges that could lead to the death penalty or life in prison, U.S. Attorney General Loretta Lynch said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alleged Charleston church shooter Dylann Roof faces federal hate crimes and firearms charges that could lead to the death penalty or life in prison, U.S. Attorney General Loretta Lynch said on Wednesday.

headline.main: National Portrait Gallery to Honor 5 People From Collection
headline.print_headline: National Portrait Gallery to Honor 5 People From Collection

docs.snippet: The National Portrait Gallery plans to honor baseball's Hank Aaron, singer Aretha Franklin, fashion designer Carolina Herrera, designer Maya Lin and U.S. Marine Cpl. Kyle Carpenter at a gala to raise funds for exhibitions....
docs.lead_paragraph: The National Portrait Gallery plans to honor baseball's Hank Aaron, singer Aretha Franklin, fashion designer Carolina Herrera, designer Maya Lin and U.S. Marine Cpl. Kyle Carpenter at a gala to raise funds for exhibitions.

headline.main: Why Airlines Keep Pushing Biofuels: They Have No Choice
headline.print_headline: Why Airlines Keep Pushing Biofuels: They Have No Choice

docs.snippet: The number of global fliers is expected to more than double in the next two decades. In order to carry all those extra passengers, airlines are turning to a technology very few can make work on a large scale: converting trash into fuel....
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of global fliers is expected to more than double in the next two decades. In order to carry all those extra passengers, airlines are turning to a technology very few can make work on a large scale: converting trash into fuel.
